00047 void CDFData::Clear()
00048 {
00049         genericData.Header().Clear();
00050         setTocMetaData = false;
00051         mode = NoMode;
00052 
00053         curIndex = 0;
00054         curGroupFilePos = 0;
00055 
00056         if (tocDataSet)
00057         {
00058                 tocDataSet->Delete();
00059                 tocDataSet = 0;
00060         }
00061 
00062         nameToFilePosMap.clear();
00063 }

00085 void CDFData::SetRefSequence(const std::string &seq)
00086 {
00087         GenericDataHeader* gPtr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00088         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00089         paramType.SetName(CDF_REFSEQ_PARAM);
00090         paramType.SetValueAscii(seq);
00091         gPtr->AddNameValParam(paramType);
00092 }
00093 
00094 std::string CDFData::GetRefSequence()
00095 {
00096         std::string result;
00097         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00098         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00099         if (hdr->FindNameValParam(CDF_REFSEQ_PARAM, paramType))
00100         {
00101                 result = paramType.GetValueAscii();
00102         }
00103         return result;
00104 }

00121 void CDFData::SetProbeSetCnt(u_int32_t cnt, CDFDataTypeIds type)

00127 void CDFData::SetDataTypeId(CDFDataTypeIds p, int32_t probesetCnt)
00128 {
00129         GenericDataHeader* gPtr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00130         std::string typeId;
00131         std::wstring groupName;
00132         if(p == Expression)
00133         {
00134                 typeId = AFFY_EXPR_PS;
00135                 groupName = CDF_PS_GROUP_LBL;
00136         }
00137         else if(p == Genotyping)
00138         {
00139                 typeId = AFFY_GENO_PS;
00140                 groupName = CDF_PS_GROUP_LBL;
00141         }
00142         else if(p == Tag)
00143         {
00144                 typeId = AFFY_TAG_PS;
00145                 groupName = CDF_PS_GROUP_LBL;
00146         }
00147         else if(p == Resequencing)
00148         {
00149                 typeId = AFFY_RESEQ_PS;
00150                 groupName = CDF_PS_GROUP_LBL;
00151         }
00152         else 
00153         {
00154                 typeId = AFFY_CNTRL_PS;
00155                 groupName = CDF_QC_GROUP_LBL;
00156         }
00157         gPtr->SetFileTypeId(typeId);
00158         CreateDataGroups(groupName, probesetCnt);
00159 }
00160 
00161 std::string CDFData::GetDataTypeId()
00162 {
00163         GenericDataHeader* gPtr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00164         return gPtr->GetFileTypeId();
00165 }
00166 
00167 void CDFData::CreateDataGroups(const std::wstring& p, int32_t probesetCnt)
00168 {
00169         CreateContentsGroup(p, probesetCnt);
00170         CreateProbeSetGroups(probesetCnt);
00171 }
00172 
00173 void CDFData::CreateContentsGroup(const std::wstring& p, int32_t probesetCnt)
00174 {
00175         DataGroupHeader c(p);
00176         DataSetHeader dp;
00177         dp.SetRowCnt(probesetCnt);
00178         dp.SetName(p);
00179         dp.AddUnicodeColumn(L"", MAX_CDF_PROBE_SET_NAME_LENGTH);
00180         dp.AddIntColumn(L"");
00181         c.AddDataSetHdr(dp);
00182         genericData.Header().AddDataGroupHdr(c);
00183 }
00184 
00185 void CDFData::CreateProbeSetGroups(int32_t probesetCnt)
00186 {
00187         for(int i = 0; i < probesetCnt; i++)
00188         {
00189                 DataGroupHeader c;
00190                 genericData.Header().AddDataGroupHdr(c);
00191         }
00192 }

00194 u_int32_t CDFData::GetUInt32FromGenericHdr(const std::wstring& name)
00195 {
00196         int32_t result = 0;
00197         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00198         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00199         if (hdr->FindNameValParam(name, paramType))
00200         {
00201                 result = paramType.GetValueUInt32();
00202         }
00203         return result;
00204 }
00205 
00206 void CDFData::SetUInt32ToGenericHdr(const std::wstring& name, u_int32_t value)
00207 {
00208         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00209         paramType.SetName(name);
00210         paramType.SetValueUInt32(value);
00211         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00212         hdr->AddNameValParam(paramType);
00213 }

00215 void CDFData::PrepareForSequentialAccess()
00216 {
00217         // set the mode
00218         mode = SequentialMode;
00219 
00220         // skip-over the first DataGroup
00221         DataGroup dg = genericData.DataGroup(genericData.Header().GetFirstDataGroupFilePos());
00222         curGroupFilePos = dg.Header().GetNextGroupPos();
00223 
00224         // initialize the curPos
00225         curIndex = 0;
00226 }
00227 
00228 void CDFData::PrepareForAccessByProbeSetIndex()
00229 {
00230         // set the mode
00231         mode = ProbeSetIndexMode;
00232 
00233         // Open the first DataGroup
00234         DataGroup dg = genericData.DataGroup(genericData.Header().GetFirstDataGroupFilePos());
00235 
00236         // Open the first DataSet
00237         if (tocDataSet)
00238                 tocDataSet->Delete();
00239         tocDataSet = dg.DataSet(0);
00240         if (tocDataSet)
00241                 tocDataSet->Open();
00242 }
00243 
00244 void CDFData::PrepareForAccessByProbeSetName()
00245 {
00246         // set the mode
00247         mode = ProbeSetNameMode;
00248 
00249         // Open the first DataGroup
00250         DataGroup dg = genericData.DataGroup(genericData.Header().GetFirstDataGroupFilePos());
00251 
00252         // Open the first DataSet
00253         if (tocDataSet)
00254                 tocDataSet->Delete();
00255         tocDataSet = dg.DataSet(0);
00256         if (tocDataSet)
00257         {
00258                 if (tocDataSet->Open())
00259                 {
00260 
00261                         // build the name-file position map
00262                         int32_t rows = tocDataSet->Rows();
00263 
00264                         std::wstring probeSetName;
00265                         u_int32_t filePos = 0;
00266 
00267                         for (int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row)
00268                         {
00269                                 tocDataSet->GetData(row, TOCProbeSetNameCol, probeSetName);
00270                                 tocDataSet->GetData(row, TOCFilePosCol, filePos);
00271 
00272                                 nameToFilePosMap[probeSetName] = filePos;
00273                         }
00274                 }
00275         }
00276 }

00279  */
00280 void CDFData::GetProbeSetInformation(int32_t index, CDFProbeSetInformation& info)
00281 {
00282         if (GetDataTypeId() == AFFY_CNTRL_PS)
00283         {
00284                 ProbeSetNotFoundException e;
00285                 throw e;
00286         }
00287 
00288         if (index >= genericData.Header().GetNumDataGroups()-1)
00289         {
00290                 ProbeSetNotFoundException e;
00291                 throw e;
00292         }
00293 
00294         if (mode == SequentialMode)
00295         {
00296                 if (index == curIndex)
00297                 {
00298                         DataGroup dg = genericData.DataGroup(curGroupFilePos);
00299                         info.SetDataGroup(dg);
00300 
00301                         // Move to the next data group
00302                         ++curIndex;
00303                         curGroupFilePos = dg.Header().GetNextGroupPos();
00304                 }
00305                 else
00306                 {
00307                         CDFAccessNotSupportedByModeException e;
00308                         throw e;
00309                 }
00310         }
00311         else if (mode == ProbeSetIndexMode)
00312         {
00313                 u_int32_t filePos = GetTOCFilePosByIndex(index);
00314                 DataGroup dg = genericData.DataGroup(filePos);
00315                 info.SetDataGroup(dg);
00316         }
00317         else
00318         {
00319                 CDFAccessNotSupportedByModeException e;
00320                 throw e;
00321         }
00322 }
00323 
00324 void CDFData::GetProbeSetInformation(const std::wstring& probeSetName, CDFProbeSetInformation& info)
00325 {
00326         if (GetDataTypeId() == AFFY_CNTRL_PS)
00327         {
00328                 ProbeSetNotFoundException e;
00329                 throw e;
00330         }
00331 
00332         if (mode != ProbeSetNameMode)
00333         {
00334                 CDFAccessNotSupportedByModeException e;
00335                 throw e;
00336         }
00337 
00338         u_int32_t filePos = GetTOCFilePosByName(probeSetName);
00339         DataGroup dg = genericData.DataGroup(filePos);
00340         info.SetDataGroup(dg);
00341 }

00344 void CDFData::GetQCProbeSetInformation(int32_t index, CDFQCProbeSetInformation& info)
00345 {
00346         if (GetDataTypeId() != AFFY_CNTRL_PS)
00347         {
00348                 ProbeSetNotFoundException e;
00349                 throw e;
00350         }
00351 
00352         if (index >= genericData.Header().GetNumDataGroups()-1)
00353         {
00354                 ProbeSetNotFoundException e;
00355                 throw e;
00356         }
00357 
00358         if (mode == SequentialMode)
00359         {
00360                 if (index == curIndex)
00361                 {
00362                         DataGroup dg = genericData.DataGroup(curGroupFilePos);
00363                         DataSet* ds = dg.DataSet(0);
00364                         info.SetDataSet(ds);
00365 
00366                         // Move to the next data group
00367                         ++curIndex;
00368                         curGroupFilePos = dg.Header().GetNextGroupPos();
00369                 }
00370                 else
00371                 {
00372                         CDFAccessNotSupportedByModeException e;
00373                         throw e;
00374                 }
00375         }
00376         else if (mode == ProbeSetIndexMode)
00377         {
00378                 u_int32_t filePos = GetTOCFilePosByIndex(index);
00379                 DataGroup dg = genericData.DataGroup(filePos);
00380                 DataSet* ds = dg.DataSet(0);
00381                 info.SetDataSet(ds);
00382         }
00383         else
00384         {
00385                 CDFAccessNotSupportedByModeException e;
00386                 throw e;
00387         }
00388 }

00390 void CDFData::GetQCProbeSetInformation(const std::wstring& probeSetName, CDFQCProbeSetInformation& info)
00391 {
00392         if (GetDataTypeId() != AFFY_CNTRL_PS)
00393         {
00394                 ProbeSetNotFoundException e;
00395                 throw e;
00396         }
00397 
00398         if (mode != ProbeSetNameMode)
00399         {
00400                 CDFAccessNotSupportedByModeException e;
00401                 throw e;
00402         }
00403 
00404         u_int32_t filePos = GetTOCFilePosByName(probeSetName);
00405         DataGroup dg = genericData.DataGroup(filePos);
00406         DataSet* ds = dg.DataSet(0);
00407         info.SetDataSet(ds);
00408 }
00409 
00410 u_int32_t CDFData::GetTOCFilePosByIndex(int32_t index)
00411 {
00412         if (tocDataSet == 0 || tocDataSet->IsOpen() == false)
00413         {
00414                 DataSetNotOpenException e;
00415                 throw e;
00416         }
00417 
00418         u_int32_t filePos = (u_int32_t)-1;
00419         tocDataSet->GetData(index, TOCFilePosCol, filePos);
00420         return filePos;
00421 }
00422 
00423 u_int32_t CDFData::GetTOCFilePosByName(const std::wstring& name)
00424 {
00425         if (tocDataSet == 0 || tocDataSet->IsOpen() == false)
00426         {
00427                 DataSetNotOpenException e;
00428                 throw e;
00429         }
00430 
00431         std::map<std::wstring, u_int32_t>::iterator ii = nameToFilePosMap.find(name);
00432         if (ii == nameToFilePosMap.end())
00433         {
00434                 ProbeSetNotFoundException e;
00435                 throw e;
00436         }
00437         else
00438                 return ii->second;
00439 }
00440 
00441 std::wstring CDFData::GetProbeSetName(int32_t index)
00442 {
00443         // Access the TOC data set
00444         if (tocDataSet == 0)
00445         {
00446                 DataGroup dg = genericData.DataGroup(genericData.Header().GetFirstDataGroupFilePos());
00447                 tocDataSet = dg.DataSet(0);
00448 
00449                 if (tocDataSet == 0)
00450                 {
00451                         DataSetNotOpenException e;
00452                         throw e;
00453                 }
00454         }
00455         // Open the TOC data set if not open
00456         if (tocDataSet->IsOpen() == false)
00457         {
00458                 tocDataSet->Open();
00459                 if (tocDataSet->IsOpen() == false)
00460                 {
00461                         DataSetNotOpenException e;
00462                         throw e;
00463                 }
00464         }
00465         
00466         if (index < 0 || index >= tocDataSet->Rows())
00467         {
00468                 ProbeSetNotFoundException e;
00469                 throw e;
00470         }
00471 
00472         std::wstring probeSetName;
00473         tocDataSet->GetData(index, TOCProbeSetNameCol, probeSetName);
00474         return probeSetName;
00475 }
